title: Westport Soundings
description: Poems and translations from Italian, Latin, French (Relations des Jesuites) and Russian.the verse ranges from multi-vocal Eliotic nonosyllabics to sonnets and ballad form. The multi vocal often feature scandalous overheard conversations, or even a monolog by the declining Joseph P Kennedy, who thought Eisenhower's funeral was that of his last son, Ted.
author: Alan W. Powers
